mapper.insert: insert into moment_comment(moment_id, user_id, content, time) values(#{momentId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{time})
mapper.select:
select moment_comment_id, mc.user_id, username, email 'user_email', mobile 'user_mobile', content, time from moment_comment mc join user u on mc.user_id = u.user_id where moment_id=#{momentId} order by time
limit #{starting}, #{pageSize}
